forum.name: T5 OPTIONAL Activity & Discussion: Post to a LINCS Discussion Group
forum.intro:
Optional Activity – Strengthening Your Participation in the LINCS CoP/Discussion Group

Previously, we asked you to join the LINCS Community of Practice and at least one Discussion Group. Now we ask you to more actively participate in one or more groups by posting either:

  • One meaningful comment in an existing discussion (reply to a question, share a resource, experience or idea, or pose a question), or
  • A new discussion topic relating to the group’s interests (share a resource or idea and/or pose a question to the group).

Optional Discussion:
Once your comment/post is complete, copy the web page link and share the link with your peers via the Reply link below.

Enhance your Community Participation further:

Visit at least one peer’s post on the LINCS CoP and respond in some way (like it, share it via social media, or reply with a comment). You may have to join their Discussion Group in order to respond.

Once You Have Completed Posting Your Replies:

Return to the Course Outline (from the LINCS CoP or the discussion below) to access the next course activity.
